attributes.action: Acknowledge the UK's great scientific past and to continue as such in the future by increasing spending on research and raising scietific pay scales.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK produces some of the best scientists in the World. But they are not valued as they should be. Goverment funding needs to be increased to keep the UK at the forefront on scientific advances in the 21st century.
